title: patching loop
body: Game will download patch- login to client- say it needs to restore to a previous version. happened 6 times so far.

replies.body:
I may be able to help here!  It seems like your update isn't being installed properly, which is usually caused by a permission problem or bad install.  Start off by downloading our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to see if a Force Repatch can help here.

If that doesn't work, run through our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to clear up any blocks that would be preventing proper game file access.  You may need to try a force repatch again afterwards!
